attributes.action: Stop the illegal immigrants crossing the channel
attributes.additional_details: This country cannot sustain the amount of illegals crossing the channel daily
attributes.background: This constant flow of illegal immigrants must stop ...stop all benefits and housing completely for illegal immigrants and send them back immediately from whence they came

rejection.details:
Under international law, it is legal for a person to apply for asylum in any country that has signed the 1951 Geneva Convention and to remain there until the authorities have assessed their claim. 

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to withdraw from international treaties that give people the right to seek asylum in the UK, if that's what you'd like to happen.
